AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 22/2010

Subj curity announcement and security signage

Passengers and public awareness is very much essential for effective
implementation of civil aviation security. It has been observed that many aspects can
be imbibed through frequent public announcements and display of security signage at
the airports. Therefore, the following templates are circulated for necessary action :

1.1 Passengers are requested to contact CISF/APSU Control Room at Phone
in case of any suspicious baggage or suspicious activity.

IF YOU NOTICE ANY
UNATTENDED BAGGAGE OR
SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY
PLEASE DIAL PHONE ...

ta

2. All airport operators are required to display the above template at conspicuous
places in the airport for information of public and also make public announcements
frequently.

Commissioner of Security (CA)
Distribution :
As per standard list attached
